chat.title: naloxone
chat.message:
- in cardiac arrest: 2mg IV/IM Q2min (not sure if this would go in an arrest set instead)
- add consult ICU (if pt on infusion)
- do we want something in text re: rebound overdose / post-naloxone care? (ex. obs 2 hours post narcan)
https://emergencymedicinecases.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Opiod-Overdose.jpg.webp
